job_title: Computer Vision and Machine Learning Intern
job_description: Sorry, we couldn't find anything hereThe job posting you're looking for might have closed, or it has been removed. (404 error).

<p><span style="font-size:16.0px"><span style="font-family:Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif"><b>Location Designation:</b> Hybrid - 3 days per week </span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:0.0pt;margin-left:0.0in;margin-right:0.0in;margin-top:0.0in"> </p><div><div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Shape your future with a dynamic internship experience at New York Life. We offer opportunities across a variety of exciting businesses, including Actuarial, AI &amp; Data, Finance, Investments, Technology, Underwriting, and more. Your internship journey is designed to challenge you through hands-on work experience that will equip you with valuable skills you can use anywhere. You will build your network through collaboration and connection with talented interns and experienced employees through team-building activities, mentorship programs, and fun social events. By the end of your internship, you'll be equipped with new skills and a network that will propel you forward in your career journey. </span></p></div><div><p> </p><p><span style="font-size: 14.0pt; font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif;"><strong>Program Overview: </strong></span></p><p> </p></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Launch Your Career in a Technology, Data, and AI–Driven Organization with Purpose and Impact!</span></p><p> </p><div><p><span style="font-size: 14.0pt; font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Join us as a Technology Analyst Summer Intern for an immersive 11-week experience where innovation, collaboration, and real-world impact intersect. As part of our dynamic Technology, Data, AI &amp; Ventures department, you’ll gain hands-on exposure to cutting-edge projects that drive our digital transformation, while exploring potential career paths in Technology!</span></p><p> </p></div><div><p><span style="font-size: 14.0pt; font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Throughout the summer, you’ll deepen your technical skills, expand your professional network, and receive mentorship and guidance from experienced professionals and senior leaders. Our program combines meaningful project work with learning and development opportunities designed to prepare you for success beyond graduation. </span></p><p> </p></div><div><p><span style="font-size: 14.0pt; font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">You’ll connect with a diverse cohort of interns, collaborate on a team-based capstone project, and contribute to our commitment to social good by participating in our Volunteer for Good initiative. Whether you're building innovative solutions, leveraging AI and automation, or reimagining the future of work, you’ll play a vital role in helping us shape what’s next in technology. </span></p><p> </p></div><div><p><span style="font-size: 14.0pt; font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">This internship is more than just a summer job—it’s a steppingstone toward becoming a future-ready technology professional, with the opportunity to convert to a full-time role after graduation. </span></p></div></div></div><div> </div><div> </div><div><p> </p></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><strong>About the Internship </strong></span></p></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Join us for 11 weeks as a Technology Analyst Intern, where you’ll: </span></p></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Work on real-world technology projects that support our business </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Learn how AI and automation are transforming financial services </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Collaborate with teams across the company to solve meaningful problems </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Participate in intern socials, mentorship, and Volunteer for Good community events </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Engage in a group capstone project with other Technology, AI &amp; Data Interns </span></p></li></ul></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><img style="height: auto; width: auto;" src="data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAABCAYAAAAfFcSJAAAAAXNSR0IArs4c6QAAAARnQU1BAACxjwv8YQUAAAAJcEhZcwAADsMAAA7DAcdvqGQAAAANSURBVBhXY2BgYGAAAAAFAAGKM+MAAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC" alt="Shape"></span></p><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><strong>What You'll Do </strong></span></p></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><strong>As a Technology Analyst, you'll: </strong></span></p></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Connect business needs with technology solutions—often powered by AI and data </span></p></li></ul></div></div><div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Help redesign processes and document improvements </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Support product owners with feature development and testing </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Analyze data and trends to help drive decisions </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Create dashboards and reports to monitor performance </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Recommend ways to improve operations using smart technologies </span></p></li></ul></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><img style="height: auto; width: auto;" src="data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAABCAYAAAAfFcSJAAAAAXNSR0IArs4c6QAAAARnQU1BAACxjwv8YQUAAAAJcEhZcwAADsMAAA7DAcdvqGQAAAANSURBVBhXY2BgYGAAAAAFAAGKM+MAAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC" alt="Shape"> </span></p></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><strong>What We're Looking For </strong></span></p></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><strong>Required: </strong></span></p></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Rising senior or graduate student pursuing a degree in Business, Computer Science, or related field </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Interest in financial services and emerging technologies like AI </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Strong communication, analytical, and problem-solving skills </span></p></li></ul></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><strong>Preferred: </strong></span></p></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">GPA of 3.2 or higher </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Experience documenting technical or business requirements </span></p></li></ul></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><img style="height: auto; width: auto;" src="data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAABCAYAAAAfFcSJAAAAAXNSR0IArs4c6QAAAARnQU1BAACxjwv8YQUAAAAJcEhZcwAADsMAAA7DAcdvqGQAAAANSURBVBhXY2BgYGAAAAAFAAGKM+MAAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC" alt="Shape"> </span></p></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><strong>Why New York Life </strong></span></p></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">We’re one of Fortune’s World’s Most Admired Companies, driven by a mission to serve communities and help people achieve financial security. As an intern, you’ll join a collaborative, inclusive culture where innovation is encouraged, and AI is shaping the future of work. </span></p></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Applications reviewed: On a rolling basis </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Interviews begin: Mid-September </span></p></li></ul><p> </p><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><em>To be eligible for this program, you must be authorized to work in the U.S. We do not offer any type of employment-based immigration sponsorship for this program. Likewise, this program is not available to those authorized to work under optional practical training (OPT) or curricular practical training (CPT). </em></span></p><p> </p><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14pt;"><span style="color: white;"><strong><span style="color: black;">Curious what it’s like to intern at NYL? Check out </span><span style="color: rgb(30, 83, 163);"><a title="https://www.linkedin.com/search/results/all/?keywords=%23nylearlycareers&amp;origin=global_search_header&amp;sid=eko" href="https://www.linkedin.com/search/results/all/?keywords=%23nylearlycareers&amp;origin=GLOBAL_SEARCH_HEADER&amp;sid=EkO" target="_blank" rel="noopener">#NYLEarlyCareers</a></span><span style="color: black;"> on LinkedIn!</span></strong></span></span></p><table class="MsoNormalTable" border="0" cellspacing="3" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td style="padding: 0.75pt 0.75pt 0.75pt 0.75pt;"><p style="margin: 0.0in; font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: Aptos, sans-serif;"><span style="color: white; font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">#Techcampus</span></p></td></tr></tbody></table><p><span style="color: white; font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">#LI-CV1 </span></p></div></div><p> </p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;">​<strong><span style="color: black;">Pay Transparency</span></strong></span></span></p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;">Salary Range: <span style="color: #1d2d3e;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;">$30-35/hour + $3,000 housing stipend</span></span></span></span> </span></span></p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;">Overtime eligible: <span style="color: #1d2d3e;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;">Nonexempt</span></span></span></span> </span></span></p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;">Discretionary bonus eligible: <span style="color: #1d2d3e;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;">No</span></span></span></span> </span></span></p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;">Sales bonus eligible: <span style="color: #1d2d3e;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;">No</span></span></span></span> </span></span></p><p> </p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;">Actual base salary will be determined based on several factors but not limited to individual’s experience, skills, qualifications, and job location. Additionally, employees are eligible for an annual discretionary bonus. In addition to base salary, employees may also be eligible to participate in an incentive program.</span></span></p><p> </p><p> </p><p> </p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;"><strong><span style="color: black;">Our Diversity Promise</span></strong></span></span></p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;"><span style="color: black;">We believe in a diverse workforce because it is our mission to advocate for the financial security and success of people in every community. This is why diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) are guiding principles that are embedded in our brand and our culture. </span><a style="color: blue; text-decoration: underline;" href="https://www.newyorklife.com/newsroom/diversity-and-inclusion-awards">Click here</a><span style="color: black;"> to learn more about how we have been recognized for our leadership.</span></span></span></p><p> </p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;"><span style="color: black;">Recognized as one of </span><em><span style="color: black;">Fortune’s</span></em><span style="color: black;"> World’s Most Admired Companies, New York Life is committed to improving local communities through a culture of employee giving and volunteerism, supported by the <a style="color: blue; text-decoration: underline;" href="http://www.newyorklife.com/foundation">Foundation</a>. We're proud that due to our mutuality, we operate in the best interests of our policy owners. To learn more about career opportunities at New York Life, please visit the <a style="color: blue; text-decoration: underline;" href="https://www.newyorklife.com/about/careers/">Careers</a> page of <a style="color: blue; text-decoration: underline;" href="http://www.NewYorkLife.com">www.NewYorkLife.com</a></span><span class="MsoHyperlink" style="color: blue;"><u style="text-decoration: underline;">.</u></span></span></span></p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;">​</span></span></p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif; color: white;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;">​<!--StartFragment--><span data-olk-copy-source="MessageBody">#Techcampus</span> </span></span></p>

Technology Internship Program - Summer 2026Key Role DetailsThis is a full-time paid internship program spanning ten weeks from June through August 2026.  Participation in the internship requires that you are located in the continental United States with in-person attendance at your assigned location, in accordance with Capital One’s hybrid working model, for the duration of the program.Interns will be evaluated for a full-time position within our rotational programs, with start dates six months to one year following the completion of the internship. At this time, Capital One will not sponsor a new applicant for employment authorization, or offer any immigration related support for this position (i.e. H1B, F-1 OPT, F-1 STEM OPT, F-1 CPT, J-1, TN, E-2, E-3, L-1 and O-1, or any EADs or other forms of work authorization that require immigration support from an employer).Basic QualificationsCurrently pursuing a Bachelor’s degree or higher with an expectation that you will complete your most recent full-time degree program by August 2027 or earlier (for example: If you are graduating with a Bachelor’s degree in May 2026 and are also currently enrolled in a full-time Master’s degree program with an expected graduation date of May 2027, then your most recent degree program is your Master’s degree)Must be continuing in the same course of study of your most recent full-time degree program following completion of the internshipPreferred QualificationsBachelor’s degree or higher in a technical or quantitative discipline, including computer science, computer engineering, information systems, information technology, and mathematicsStrong analytical, quantitative, problem solving and conceptual skillsStrong interpersonal, leadership and communication skillsIntermediate to advanced programming skills or experience in one or more of the following areas: Go, Kotlin, Python, Java, HTML, Swift, PHP, XML, JSON, UML, JavaScript, SQL, PL/SQL, Shell scripts, Objective C, C#, C/C++, Perl,.net, asp.net, Visual Basic Technology Internship Program - Summer 2026At Capital One, we consider ourselves the bank a technology company would build. We’re delivering best-in-class innovation so that our 65 million customers - and counting - can manage their finances with ease. Our reality and vision empower our engineers to use artificial intelligence and machine learning to transform real-time data, software, and algorithms into financial clarity. That’s what sets us apart - and we want you to join our journey.We’re all-in on the cloud and are a leader in the adoption of open source, RESTful APIs, microservices, and containers. We build our own products and release them with a speed and agility that allows us to get new customer experiences to market quickly. We’re going boldly where no bank has gone before. And, as a founder-led company, we’re inspired to make, break, do, and do good. So, let’s do something great together. Want to learn more? Check out the low-down on our high-tech -https://www.capitalone.com/tech As a Software Engineer in the Technology Internship Program, you may work on everything from customer-facing web and mobile applications using cutting-edge open source frameworks, to highly-available RESTful services, to back-end Java based systems using the hottest techniques in Big Data. Our engineers work in a "You Build It, You Own It" full stack environment supporting an exciting and innovative tech stack composed of: Java, React, Angular, Vue JS, C#, REST APIs, NoSQL database, Kubernetes, Terraform, Jenkins, Docker, AWS cloud, Scala, Clojure, Java, Haskell, C++, golang, Scheme, Common Lisp, and more! The Technology Internship Program provides you the framework to develop world-class technical skills and gain a comprehensive understanding of technology.Here is what to expect during your 10 week internship:A challenging role where you’ll collaborate with a diverse and passionate team of talented engineers Engaging executive speakers and opportunities to interact closely with senior leadershipTraining & development sessions to build out your skillset on topics such iOS and Android, Web Development, AWS, Open Source Big Data tools, Security, Voice Driven Applications, and moreFun social, networking, and volunteer events with other college internsContinuous LearningWe’re here to help you gain knowledge both on the job and in the classroom. Our engineers have access to continuous learning through our very own Tech College, a world-class learning hub that offers both online and in-person classes across six disciplines— Cloud Computing, Cyber Security, Data, Machine Learning & AI, Mobile and Software Engineering.The minimum and maximum full-time annual salaries for this role are listed below, by location. Please note that this salary information is solely for candidates hired to perform work within one of these locations, and refers to the amount Capital One is willing to pay at the time of this posting. Salaries for part-time roles will be prorated based upon the agreed upon number of hours to be regularly worked.Plano, TX: $123,000 - $123,000 for Technology Intern Program Richmond, VA: $123,000 - $123,000 for Technology Intern Program         Candidates hired to work in other locations will be subject to the pay range associated with that location, and the actual annualized salary amount offered to any candidate at the time of hire will be reflected solely in the candidate’s offer letter.Capital One offers a comprehensive, competitive, and inclusive set of health, financial and other benefits that support your total well-being. Learn more at the Capital One Careers website. Eligibility varies based on full or part-time status, exempt or non-exempt status, and management level.This role is expected to accept applications for a minimum of 5 business days.No agencies please. Capital One is an equal opportunity employer (EOE, including disability/vet) committed to non-discrimination in compliance with applicable federal, state, and local laws. Capital One promotes a drug-free workplace. Capital One will consider for employment qualified applicants with a criminal history in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable laws regarding criminal background inquiries, including, to the extent applicable, Article 23-A of the New York Correction Law; San Francisco, California Police Code Article 49, Sections 4901-4920; New York City’s Fair Chance Act; Philadelphia’s Fair Criminal Records Screening Act; and other applicable federal, state, and local laws and regulations regarding criminal background inquiries.If you have visited our website in search of information on employment opportunities or to apply for a position, and you require an accommodation, please contact Capital One Recruiting at 1-800-304-9102 or via email at RecruitingAccommodation@capitalone.com. All information you provide will be kept confidential and will be used only to the extent required to provide needed reasonable accommodations.For technical support or questions about Capital One's recruiting process, please send an email to Careers@capitalone.comCapital One does not provide, endorse nor guarantee and is not liable for third-party products, services, educational tools or other information available through this site.Capital One Financial is made up of several different entities. Please note that any position posted in Canada is for Capital One Canada, any position posted in the United Kingdom is for Capital One Europe and any position posted in the Philippines is for Capital One Philippines Service Corp.
